function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","Impact":"Inaccurate detection can lead to undetected individuals, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Use additional sensors or technologies to capture more comprehensive data, and improve the detection algorithm to account for partial visibility.","Technologies":"Advanced computer vision algorithms, depth cameras, LiDAR sensors","People":"Individuals in crowded areas, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in extreme lighting conditions and lens distortion effects","Impact":"Reduced accuracy in detection and tracking of individuals, leading to potential errors in social distancing evaluations.","Mitigation":"Conduct further investigations and experiments to understand the impact of lighting and lens distortion, and develop adaptive algorithms to compensate for these effects.","Technologies":"Advanced image processing techniques, adaptive computer vision algorithms","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Social distancing violation due to inaccurate distance measurements","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to inaccurate identification of social distancing violations.","Mitigation":"Calibrate the distance measurement system and conduct regular checks for accuracy, and use multiple sensors to improve distance measurement reliability.","Technologies":"LiDAR sensors, infrared distance measurement systems","People":"Public health officials, individuals in public spaces","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities"}]}
